trendingProducts.overview: An overnight sleeping mask that delivers intense hydration while you sleep. This lightweight, gel-based formula helps restore your skin's moisture barrier overnight, leaving you with plump, dewy skin by morning.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Trehalose, Sodium Hyaluronate, Beta-Glucan, Hunza Apricot Extract, Evening Primrose Root Extract, Sleepscent™ (Orange Flower, Rose, Sandalwood)
trendingProducts.howTo:
Apply as the last step of your nighttime routine
Spread evenly over face and neck
Leave on overnight and rinse off in the morning
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Hydro Ionized Mineral Water and Sleepscent™ provide deep overnight hydration while you sleep, leaving skin refreshed and plump.

trendingProducts.overview: A lightweight, gel-cream moisturizer that provides 24-hour hydration while strengthening your skin's natural barrier. Perfect for all skin types, including oily and combination skin that needs moisture without heaviness.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Isononyl Isononanoate, Niacinamide, Ceramide NP, Ceramide AP, Ceramide EOP, Phytosphingosine, Cholesterol, Sodium Lauroyl Lactylate, Carbomer, Xanthan Gum
trendingProducts.howTo:
Apply morning and evening to clean skin
Gently massage into face and neck
Use as final step in routine
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Barrier-lipid complex with ceramides and niacinamide strengthens skin barrier while providing lightweight hydration for all skin types.

trendingProducts.overview: A deeply hydrating face cream enriched with green tea seed oil and 5 types of hyaluronic acid. This lightweight yet nourishing formula provides 100-hour lasting moisture while strengthening the skin barrier.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Water, Camellia Sinensis Seed Oil, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Green Tea Extract, Beta-Glucan
trendingProducts.howTo:
After serum, smooth a dime-sized amount onto face and neck
Gently pat for better absorption
Use AM & PM, follow with sunscreen in the AM
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Green Tea Barrier Complex with 5 types of hyaluronic acid fortifies skin's barrier and provides 100-hour long-lasting hydration with 113% improved moisture barrier strength.

trendingProducts.overview: A potent vitamin C serum that brightens skin and provides powerful antioxidant protection. Features a stable form of vitamin C combined with ferulic acid and vitamin E for enhanced effectiveness and skin brightening benefits.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate (Vitamin C), Ferulic Acid, Konjac Root, Clary Sage, Chamomile Flower Extract, Grapefruit Peel Oil, Vitamin E, Hyaluronic Acid
trendingProducts.howTo:
Apply 2-3 drops to clean skin in the morning
Gently massage until absorbed
Always follow with SPF during the day
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Stable vitamin C with ferulic acid and vitamin E provides powerful antioxidant protection and helps brighten skin tone.

trendingProducts.overview: A lightweight, hydrating serum that creates a glossy, glazed skin finish. Formulated with peptides and niacinamide to improve skin texture while providing a luminous, dewy glow that lasts all day.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Pentylene Glycol, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Sodium Hyaluronate, Polyglutamic Acid, Allantoin, Panthenol, Carbomer
trendingProducts.howTo:
Apply 2-3 pumps after cleansing
Gently press into skin until absorbed
Use morning and evening before moisturizer
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Peptide complex with niacinamide and hyaluronic acid helps improve skin texture and provides a luminous, glazed finish.

trendingProducts.overview: A gentle retinol eye cream specifically formulated for the delicate eye area. Helps reduce the appearance of fine lines and dark circles while being gentle enough for nightly use around sensitive eye skin.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Retinol, Palmitoyl Pentapeptide-4, Sodium Hyaluronate, Caffeine, Vitamin E, Shea Butter, Ceramide 3, Allantoin
trendingProducts.howTo:
Apply small amount around eye area in the evening
Gently tap with ring finger until absorbed
Start with 2-3 times per week, gradually increase frequency
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Gentle retinol formula with peptides helps reduce fine lines and improve skin texture around the delicate eye area.

trendingProducts.overview: A lightweight, hydrating toner that preps skin for better absorption of subsequent skincare products. Formulated with vitamin B5 and hyaluronic acid to provide deep, lasting moisture without stickiness.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Water, Butylene Glycol, Glycereth-26, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Allantoin, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin
trendingProducts.howTo:
Pat onto skin after cleansing
Use 2–3 layers if skin is dehydrated
Allow each layer to fully absorb
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Hyaluronic acid and vitamin B5 provide deep hydration while preparing skin for better absorption of subsequent products.

trendingProducts.overview: A lightweight gel version of the iconic Water Sleeping Mask. Perfect for oily and combination skin, this formula provides intensive overnight hydration and barrier repair without clogging pores.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Water, Dipropylene Glycol, Glycerin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Trehalose, Hunza Apricot Extract, Evening Primrose Root Extract, Beta-Glucan, Ceramide NP
trendingProducts.howTo:
Apply thin layer as final PM step
Pat gently until absorbed
Use 3-4x per week to avoid over-moisturizing
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Lightweight gel formula delivers intensive overnight hydration and barrier repair without clogging pores.

trendingProducts.productName: Aveeno Calm + Restore Oat Gel Moisturizer
trendingProducts.overview: A lightweight, gel-lotion hybrid that soothes sensitive skin while providing balanced hydration. Formulated with prebiotic oat extract to strengthen the skin barrier and reduce irritation for healthier-looking skin.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Water, Isopropyl Palmitate, Glycerin, Dimethicone, Avena Sativa (Oat) Kernel Extract, Isopropyl Isostearate, Petrolatum, Dimethiconol, Allantoin, Ceramide 3
trendingProducts.howTo:
Apply more product to areas that need extra hydration
Use lighter amount on areas prone to oiliness
Pat gently until absorbed, adjust as needed
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Lightweight gel-lotion hybrid with oat extract balances hydration needs effectively while soothing sensitive skin.

trendingProducts.overview: A gentle exfoliating treatment with 5% lactic acid and hyaluronic acid. Perfect for sensitive skin, this AHA helps remove dead skin cells while providing hydration, revealing smoother, brighter skin over time.
trendingProducts.ingredients: Aqua (Water), Lactic Acid, Rosa damascena flower water, Centaurea cyanus flower water, Hyaluronic Acid, Vegetable Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Polysorbate 20, Triethanolamine, Tasmannia Lanceolata Fruit/Leaf Extract
trendingProducts.howTo:
Apply thin layer to clean skin PM only
Start 2-3x per week, avoid eye area
Always follow with moisturizer and SPF next day
trendingProducts.whyEffective: Lactic acid gently exfoliates dead skin cells while hyaluronic acid provides hydration, making it ideal for sensitive skin.
